Articles.Content:
While I know there's the AeroGUI in the Alt-f12 menu, I am not sure how to read the drag figure. Namely, i want to see what's the difference between a retracted wheel and a non retracted one.

Edited March 16, 2018 by Jestersage

It's best to use the "Show Aero Data in Action Menus" button in the Debug Menu.

Then you open the action menu for one of your wheels. The third item is the drag on the part in kN. Then just extend and retract the wheel a time or two and watch the numbers change.
